QuestData.Title: Obtaining Ogre Offensive Orders
QuestData.Description: The upper bluff must be really important to the ogres. Two fancy looking ogre mages came down from there and starting ordering all the others around.$b$bGo get those orders and meet up with my scout Dalgorsh on the upper bluff. They will be more useful to him up there.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect Crulgorosh's Orders and Thulgork's Orders at Mar'gok's Overwatch.
QuestData.RewardText: Finally some help! I barely got out alive!$b$bYou have some ogre orders? Let me see...$b$bWell that's not good news.
